name: tencent_chat_i18n_tool
description: Welcome to the [Tencent Cloud Chat](https://www.tencentcloud.com/zh/products/im?from=pub) Internationalization (i18n) Tool, a dedicated package developed by [Tencent Cloud Chat](https://www.tencentcloud.com/zh/products/im?from=pub) team. This package offers a light, powerful and developer-friendly internationalization language tool tailored for our [Chat UIKit](https://www.tencentcloud.com/document/product/1047/50059) and the applications from our customers.
